titleStmt.title: Consolation in life and death wherein is shewed that interest in Christ is a ground of comfort ... begun in a funeral sermon occasioned by the death of Mrs. Ellen Asty, and since much enlarged : together with the life of the said Mrs. Ellen Asty / by Owen Stockton ...
titleStmt.author: Stockton, Owen, 1630-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Tho. Parkhurst ;

notesStmt.note: "The life of Mrs. Ellen Asty" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
